Title: Reduces the number of signatures required for designating and nominating petitions
Summary: Reduces the number of signatures required for designating and nominating petitions to one and one half per centum or thirty percent of the signature threshold numbers required by law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to reducing the numbers of signatures required for designating and nominating petitions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
